Memorandum b y t h e M i n i s t e r of Economic Warfare.^ I c i r c u l a t e h e r e w i t h t h e d r a f t of an O r d e r i n - C o u n c i l p r e p a r e d i n c o n s u l t a t i o n w i t h t h e A t t o r n ey G e n e r a l , t h e F o r e i g n O f f i c e , t h e P r o c u r a t o r - G e n e r al a n d t h e A d m i r a l t y , i n o r d e r to g i v e e f f e c t to C o n c l u s i o n ( i v ) of I t e m S of t h e 9 0 t h M e e t i n g of t he War C a b i n e t h e l d on 2 1 s t November. I a l s o c i r c u l a t e a c o m m e n t a r y on t h e d r a ft O r d e r p r e p a r e d by t h e A t t o r n e y - G e n e r a l. ( I n i t i a l l e d ) R.H.C. Richmond T e r r a c e , S , W . i, 2 4 t h November, 1939.
DRAFT ORDER-IN-COUNCIL. Whereas H i s M a j e s t y h a s b e e n c o m p e l l e d t o t a ke u p arms a g a i n s t Germany i n d e f e n c e of t h e f u n d a m e n t al r i g h t of n a t i o n s t o a f r e e and p e a c e f u l e x i s t e n c e; And w h e r e a s German f o r c e s h a v e i n numerous c a s e s sunk m e r c h a n t v e s s e l s i n v i o l a t i o n of t h e r u l es c o n t a i n e d i n t h e S u b m a r i n e P r o t o c o l , 1936, t o w h i ch Germany i s a p a r t y; And w h e r e a s m e r c h a n t v e s s e l s , B r i t i s h , A l l i ed a n d n e u t r a l , have b e e n sunk by m i n e s l a i d by German f o r c e s i n d i s c r i m i n a t e l y and w i t h o u t n o t i f i c a t i o n , in c o n t r a v e n t i o n of t h e l a w s of h u m a n i t y and t h e p r o v i s i o ns of t h e Hague C o n v e n t i o n NooVIII of 1907 t o which Germany i s a p a r t y; And w h e r e a s t h e s i n k i n g of t h e s e v e s s e l s h a s b e en - e f f e c t e d w i t h o u t r e g a r d t o t h e i r n a t i o n a l i t y or d e s t i n a t i o n or t o t h e n a t u r e o w n e r s h i p or d e s t i n a t i o n of v t h e i r c a r g o e s; And w h e r e a s t h e s e a c t s h a v e a l r e a d y r e s u l t e d in g r a v e l o s s of n o n - c o m b a t a n t l i f e , B r i t i s h , A l l i e d and n e u t r a l ; And w h e r e a s i t i s m a n i f e s t t h a t t h e German Government have d e l i b e r a t e l y embarked on a p o l i c y of e n d e a v o u r i n g t o d e s t r o y a l l s e a b o r n e t r a d e b e t w e e n t he A l l i e d and o t h e r c o u n t r i e s by a r u t h l e s s u s e of t h e f o r c es a t t h e i r d i s p o s a l , c o n t r a r y t o t h e laws and c u s t o m s of war, t h e r i g h t s of n e u t r a l s and t h e o b l i g a t i o n s of h u m a n i t y; And w h e r e a s t h i s a c t i o n on t h e p a r t of t h e German Government g i v e s t o His M a j e s t y an u n q u e s t i o n a b le r i g h t cf r e t a l i a t i o n;
And w h e r e a s i t i s His M a j e s t y ' s i n t e n t i o n to e x e r c i s e t h i s r i g h t w i t h o u t r i s k t o n e u t r a l s h i p s or t o n e u t r a l or t o n o n - c o m b a t a n t l i f e and i n s t r i ct o b s e r v a n c e of t h e o b l i g a t i o n s of h u m a n i t y; And w h e r e a s t h e A l l i e s of His M a j e s t y a re a s s o c i a t e d w i t h h im i n t h e s t e p s now t o be a n n o u n c ed f o r r e s t r i c t i n g f u r t h e r t h e commerce of Germany; Now, t h e r e f o r e , His M a j e s t y i s p l e a s e d , by and w i t h t h e a d v i c e of H i s P r i v y C o u n c i l , t o o r d e r and i t i s h e r e b y o r d e r e d a s f o l l o w s : 1* Every m e r c h a n t v e s s e l which s a i l e d from any enemy p o r t , i n c l u d i n g any p o r t i n t e r r i t o r y u n d e r enemy o c c u p a t i o n or c o n t r o l , a f t e r t h e 4 t h day of December, 1 9 3 9 , may be r e q u i r e d to d i s c h a r g e i n a B r i t i s h or A l l i ed p o r t any goods on b o a r d l a d e n i n such enemy p o r t. 2 . Every m e r c h a n t v e s s e l which s a i l e d from a p o r t o t h e r t h a n an enemy p o r t a f t e r t h e 4 t h day of D e c e m b e r , 1 9 3 9 , h a v i n ^ on b o a r d goods w h i c h a r e of enemy o r i g i n o r a r e enemy p r o p e r t y may b e r e q u i r e d t o d i s c h a r ge s u c h goods i n a B r i t i s h or A l l i e d p o r t 0 3-. Goods d i s c h a r g e d i n a B r i t i s h p o r t u n d er e i t h e r of t h e p r e c e d i n g A r t i L l e s s h a l l b e p l a c e d in t h e c u s t o d y of t h e M a r s h a l of t h e P r i z e C o u r t , and, u n l e s s t h e C o u r t o r d e r s them t o be r e q u i s i t i o n e d f or t h e u s e of His M a j e s t y , s h a l l b e d e t a i n e d or s o l d u n d er t h e d i r e c t i o n of t h e C o u r t , , The p r o c e e d s of goods so s o l d s h a l l be p a i d i n t o C o u r te On t h e c o n c l u s i o n of p e a c e s u c h p r o c e e d s and any g o o d s d e t a i n e d b u t n o t s o l d s h a l l be d e a l t with" i n such manner a s t h e C o u r t may i n t h e c i r c u m s t a n c e s deem j u s t;
p r o v i d e d t h a t n o t h i n g h e r e i n s h a l l p r e v e n t t h e p a y m e nt o u t of C o u r t of any s u c h p r o c e e d s or t h e r e l e a s e of any goods a t any t i m e ( a ) i f i t be shown t o . t h e s a t i s f a c t i on of t h e C o u r t t h a t t h e goods had become n e u t r a l p r o p e r ty b e f o r e t h e d a t e of t h i s O r d e r , o r ( b ) w i t h t h e c o n s e n t of t h e p r o p e r o f f i c e r of t h e Crown. 4 . The l a w and p r a c t i c e i n P r i z e s h a l l , so f a r as a p p l i c a b l e , be f o l l o w e d i n a l l c a s e s a r i s i n g u n d e r t h is O r d e r . 5-. N o t h i n g i n t h i s O r d e r s h a l l e f f e c t t h e l i a b i l i ty of any v e s s e l o r goods t o s e i z u r e or c o n d e m n a t i on i n d e p e n d e n t l y of t h i s O r d e r. 5 . Foir t h e p u r p o s e s of t h i s O r d e r t h e words " g o o d s w h i c h a r e of enemy o r i g i n " s h a l l i n c l u d e goods h a v i n g t h e i r , o r i g i n i n any t e r r i t o r y u n d e r enemy o c c u p a t i on o r c o n t r o l , and the words " g o o d s which are enemy p r o p e r t y " s h a l l i n c l u d e goods b e l o n g i n g t o any p e r s o n i n any such t e r r i t o r y. 7 . P r o c e e d i n g s u n d e r ' t h i s Order may be t a k e n in a n y P r i z e - C o u r t h a v i n g j u r i s d i c t i o n to which t h e P i ' i ze C o u r t R u l e s , 193 9, a p p l y. 3 . For t h e p u r p o s e s of t h i s O r d e r t h e words " B r i t i s h p o r t " mean any p o r t v / i t h i n t h e j u r i s d i c t i on of any P r i z e C o u r t t o w h i c h t h e P r i z e C o u r t R u l e s , 1 9 3 9 , t a p p l y .
Note by t h e A t t o r n e y - G e n e r a l. I a t t a c h a d r a f t O r d e r - i n - C o u n c i l which h a s b e en p r e p a r e d by a C o m m i t t e e of w h i c h I was C h a i r m a n . The f o l l o w i n g commentary may be of a s s i s t a n c e. The f i r s t r e c i t a l i n t h i s d r a f t has no p a r a l l e l in t h e R e p r i s a l s O r d e r s of t h e l a s t w a r . On g e n e r a l p r i n c i p l es t h e c a u s e s w h i c h - t o a war a r e i r r e l e v a n t t o any q u e s t i on of r e p r i s a l s . On 11, o o t h e r h a n d , I t h i n k : t h a t t h i s s h o rt r e c i t a l may w e l l be a p p r o p r i a t e t o t h e p r e s e n t O r d e r . The a r g u m e n t a g a i n s t r e p r i s a l s of t h i s k i n d i s always b a s e d on t h e i n c o n v e n i e n c e and l o s s c a u s e d t o n e u t r a l s , The f a ct t h a t t h e A l l i e s have t a k e n up arms i n d e f e n c e of t he f u n d a m e n t a l r i g h t of n a t i o n s t o a f r e e and p e a c e f u l e x i s t e n c e seems a r e a s o n a b l e g r o u n d , or a t any r a t e a r e a s o n a b le b a c k g r o u n d , f o r s t e p s which w i l l c a u s e t h em p r e s e nt i n c o n v e n i e n c e , b u t w h i c h , if s u c c e s s f u l , w i l l e n h a n c e t h e ir s e c u r i t y and remove a menace t o t h e i r i n d e p e n d e n c e. The f o l l o w i n g f o u r r e c i t a l s summarize t h e i l l e g a l a c ts a t s e a , and t h e s i x t h r e c i t a l t a k e s t h e p l a c e of t h e r e c i t al i n t h e e a r l i e r O r d e r s w h i c h r e f e r r e d t o t h e e x p r e ss d e c l a r a t i o n s of p o l i c y w h i c h Germany made i n t h e l a s t war. The f i r s t r e c i t a l c o u l d be o m i t t e d w i t h o u t i n v a l i d a t i ng t h e O r d e r , b u t t h e s e l a t e r r e c i t a l s s e t out t h e g r o u n d s on w h i c h t h e v a l i d i t y of t h e Order must d e p e n d. The n e x t two r e c i t a l s s p e a k f o r t h e m s e l v e s , " and t h e l a st d e a l s w i t h t h e A l l i e s . I u n d e r s t a n d t h a t i t i s known t h at t h e F r e n c h a r e p r e p a r e d t o c o - o p e r a t e , and t h a t s t e p s a re b e i n g t a k e n t o a p p r o a c h t h e P o l e s.
The o p e r a t i v e p a r t of t h e O r d e r f o l l o w s i n g e n e r al - t h e c o r r e s p o n d i n g p r o v i s i o n s of t h e Order of March 11th, 1915, h u t h a s "been somewhat s i m p l i f i e d . Like t h e 1915 O r d e r , i t p r o v i d e s f o r t h e d e t e n t i o n or s a l e and n o t c o n d e m n a t i o n of t h e g o o d s w h i c h a r e s e i z e d as "being of enemy o r i g i n or enemy p r o p e r t y . The s u b s e q u e n t Order of F e b r u a r y 1917, i s s u e d a t t h e h e i g h t of t h e s u b m a r i n e campaign, p r o v i d e d f o r c o n d e m n a t i o n , b u t i t i s t h o u g h t t o be n e i t h er n e c e s s a r y n o r d e s i r a b l e , p a r t i c u l a r l y i n v i ew of our r e l a t i o n s w i t h n e u t r a l s , t o a d o p t t h i s more d r a s t i c c o u r s e in e x i s t i n g c i r c u m s t a n c e s . It i s , t h e r e f o r e , p r o v i d e d t h at t h e goods a r e t o be d e t a i n e d or s o l d under t h e d i r e c t i o n of t h e C o u r t , and t h a t on t h e c o n c l u s i o n of p e a c e t h e . g o o ds o r t h e i r p r o c e e d s s h a l l be d e a l t w i t h i n s u c h manner a s t he C o u r t may i n t h e c i r c u m s t a n c e s deem j u s t . P r o v i s i o n i s , h o w e v e r , made f o r t h e payment out of s a l e or t h e r e l e a s e of goods of C o u r t of t h e p r o c e e ds I t ( a ) if i t i s shown t h a t t h e n e u t r a l p r o p e r t y b e f o r e ( b ) w i t h t h e c o n s e n t of t h e i s o b v i o u s l y d e s i r a b l e t o g i v e goods have become t h e d a t e of t h e O r d e r , P r o c u r a t o r - G e n e r a l. n e u t r a l s a r i g h t to or r e l e a s e i n c a s e ( a ) , w h i l e ( b ) w i l l e n a b l e any c o n c e s s i o ns t o be made i n p a r t i c u l a r c a s e s w h i c h a r e c o n s i d e r e d d e s i r a b l e by His M a j e s t y ' s G o v e r n m e n t . Under t h e 1915 Order i t was open t o t h e C o u r t t o o r d e r t h e r e l e a s e of goods d e t a i n e d ( t h o u g h n o t t h e payment out of t h e p r o c e e d s of t h e s a l e of s u c h g o o d s ) b e f o r e t h e end of t h e war, i r r e s p e c t i v e of t h e c o n s e n t of t h e P r o c u r a t o r - G e n e r a l; i t i s t h o u g h t u n d e s i r a b l e t o a l l o w of t h i s p o s s i b i l i ty i n t h e p r e s e n t c a s e , s i n c e r e l e a s e , even t o a n e u t r al c l a i m a n t , of d e t a i n e d goods m i g h t r e s u l t i n some f i n a n c i al b e n e f i t a c c r u i n g t o t h e enemy.
9Co9 No p r o v i s i o n h a s h e e n made f o r d e a l i n g w i t h enemy i m p o r t s , and i n t h i s r e s p e c t t h e O r d e r d i f f e r s f r om the 1915 o n e . The Prime M i n i s t e r ' s s t a t e m e n t of November 22nd r e f e r r e d o n l y t o " e x p o r t s of German o r i g i n o r o w n e r s h i p ", a n d t h e r e a s o n s w h i c h n e c e s s i t a t e d a c t i o n a g a i n s t enemy i m p o r t s i n March 1915 do n o t a p p l y now. In 1915 Kis M a j e s t y ' s Government were s t i l l s e r i o u s l y h a m p e r e d in d e a l i n g w i t h c o n t r a b a n d by t h e t e r m s of t h e O r d e r - i n - G o u n c i l of O c t o b e r 2 9 t h , 1 9 1 4 , w h i c h a p p l i e d t he D e c l a r a t i o n of London w i t h c o r t a i n m o d i f i c a t i o n s , and it was n e c e s s a r y t o t a k e a d d i t i o n a l powers i f enemy i m p o r ts were t o be e f f e c t i v e l y s t o p p e d . As t h i n g s now s t a n d, h o w e v e r , our c o n t r o l of c o n t r a b a n d i s n o t h a m p e r e d in t h i s way, and o u r C o n t r a b a n d L i s t i s so e x t e n s i v e t h at t h e r e i s no n e e d t o t a k e power t o s t o p t h i n g s w h i c h a re n o t on i t . The o n l y e v e n t i n w h i c h a d d i t i o n a l powers m i g h t be d e s i r a b l e w o u l d be i f d i f f i c u l t i e s were e x p e r i e n c e d , i n t h e c a s e of c o n d i t i o n a l c o n t r a b a n d , in e s t a b l i s h i n g t h e d e s t i n a t i o n ( t o enemy armed f o r c e s , the enemy g o v e r n m e n t , e t c . ) , w h i c h i s n e c e s s a r y t o o b t a in c o n d e m n a t i o n , b u t I u n d e r s t a n d t h a t the M.E.W. do n ot a n t i c i p a t e t h a t s u c h d i f f i c u l t i e s w i l l be s e r i o u s. I f s o , t h e r e a r e , I t h i n k , c o n s i d e r a b l e a d v a n t a g e s in c o n t i n u i n g t o r e l y , as r e g a r d s enemy i m p o r t s , on t he r i g h t s u n d e r i n t e r n a t i o n a l law w h i c h we a r e a l r e a dy e x e r c i s i n g and n o t t a k i n g f r e s h powers on t h e g r o u n d s of r e p r i s a l s . This i s , I t h i n k p a r t i c u l a r l y so as r e g a r ds t h e q u e s t i o n of f o o d s t u f f s f o r t h e c i v i l i a n p o p u l a t i o n, a s t o w h i c h o b j e c t i o n s have b e e n e x p r e s s e d i n s e v e r al q u a r t e r s . At p r e s e n t we a r e i n a p o s i t i o n t o meet s u ch
o b j e c t i o n s by s a y i n g t h a t f o o d s t u f f s a r e b e i n g d e a lt w i t h u n d e r t h e o r d i n a r y law of c o n t r a b a n d , and t h a t it i s f o r t h e P r i z e C o u r t t o s a y i n e a c h p a r t i c u l a r c a se w h e t h e r t h e d e s t i n a t i o n r e q u i r e d by t h a t law i n t h e c a se of c o n d i t i o n a l c o n t r a b a n d i s e s t a b l i s h e d ; but i f we w e r e t o t a k e power t o s t o p a l l German i m p o r t s , t h is a r g u m e n t w o u l d no l o n g e r be o p e n t o u s , s i n c e a l l f o o d s t u f f s would be s t o p p e d i r r e s p e c t i v e of w h e t h e r t he d e s t i n a t i o n n e c e s s a r y t o s e c u r e t h e i r c o n d e m n a t i o n as c o n d i t i o n a l c o n t r a b a n d c o u l d be e s t a b l i s h e d or n o t. ( I n t d . ) D.B.S. 2 3 r d November, 1959.
